column4: help, im trying to configure winehq using winetools but i kep getting the message "installed.reg not found"
i got everything working in Ubuntu...i'm a bit amazed.  it;s definitely better than fedora.  but i wonder...can i ever make my webcam work in ubuntu?
does it have linux support at all?
i dont know...it's not written in the box.  But im pretty positive that there's a way of making it work
